name: A. Interview
statement:
Blake is a CEO of a large company called "Blake Technologies". He loves
his company very much and he thinks that his company should be the best.
That is why every candidate needs to pass through the interview that
consists of the following problem.We define function as a bitwise OR of
integers , where is the -th element of the array . You are given two
arrays and of length . You need to determine the maximum value of sum
among all possible .
